member.name: T:EPiServer.Find.Framework.BestBets.ExternalUrlBestBet
member.summary: Type indexed in ElasticSearch that serves as a placeholder in search results with values mapped onto it from the best bet

member.name: T:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageDocument
member.summary: Used to load and fetch translations that are stored in xml documents.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageDocument.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageDocument.FindNode(System.String[])
member.summary: Finds the node that matches the given language key.
member.returns: The that matches the given key, or null if no such translation exists.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageDocument.Translate(System.String[],System.String)
member.returns: A translated string if the translation exists; otherwise null.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageDocument.Load(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads translations from a specified file stream.
member.param: The stream containg the XML document.

member.name: T:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode
member.summary: LanguageNode are items in a that is used to store the content of language translation files.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new LanguageNode with the given name.
member.param: The name of the new node.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.AddIfNotExist(System.String)
member.summary: Add a new node with the given name if it does not exists, otherwise returns the existing node.
member.returns: A new or previously existing node.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.Name
member.summary: Get the name of the node.
member.remarks: If the node has an attribute, it will be returned with the Name property. To get the name without attribute, use the SimpleName property. I e if the node is created with constructor parameter "node[@id=23]", Name will return "node[@id=23]", SimpleName will return "node" and Attribute will return " [@id=23]".

member.name: P:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.Value
member.summary: Access the value of the node.
member.remarks: If the node has not been give a value, it will return String.Empty.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.Parent
member.summary: Get the parent of this node.
member.remarks: If this is the root node, null is returned.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.Children
member.summary: Get a collection of children to this node.
member.remarks: Even if no children exists, a valid collection is returned with Count = 0

member.name: P:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.HasChildren
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance has children.
member.value: true if this instance has children; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: Use this property for performance reasons. When accessing the Children property you will create a new dictionary object if none exists.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Accesses the child node with the requested name.
member.param: Name of the child node to access.
member.remarks: If the node is not found, null is returned for the get accessor and a new node is inserted for the set accessor.

member.name: P:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.Path
member.summary: Get the full path to this node.
member.remarks: Returns a path formatted as a simple XPath expression, for example "/root/child1/child2".

member.name: P:EPiServer.Find.Framework.UI.Localization.LanguageNode.IsNonPathNode
member.summary: Returns true if the node is part of the xml hierarchy, but not included in the language path/key, otherwise false.
